domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @JoeBiden Trump is pushing hard for a vaccine; that's all he or any politician can do since so many Americans have stopped social distancing and mask wearing. Getting haircuts, going to bars and parties, protesting. Americans surrendered to Covid-19 out of selfishness and entitlement.
